Reviews.Title: Garbage Garbage Garbage!!!
Reviews.Author: Damien
Reviews.Content: I bought this used, and I want to warn folks looking at these on the aftermarket that they have huge issues with durability.  If you search around the web, you will see that this unit is plagued with screen/hinge separation issues.  The design and build quality is so pathetically sub par.  I'm going back to Dell after this experience (my last Dell lasted me eight years).

Reviews.Title: laptop review
Reviews.Author: judy callan
Reviews.Content: This laptop is beautiful and is exactly as advertised.  I love it.  I'm still learning all it has to offer.  thank you.
